title: Fawad griefs over Naila Jaffery’s demise
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 17 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Chaudhry Fawad Hussain Saturday expressed deep sorrow and grief over the demise of an illustrious actress Naila Jaffery.
کینسر نے ایک اور چہرا زمین کے دامن میں روپوش کر دیا، خدا نائلہ جعفری کو غریق رحمت کرے وہ پاکستان ٹیلیویژن کا جانا مان چہرہ تھیں https://t.co/xlrhBUNQF5
— Ch Fawad Hussain (@fawadchaudhry) July 17, 2021
In a tweet, the minister said cancer has taken another life. The deceased was a well-known face of Pakistan Television.
He prayed the Almighty to have mercy on Naila and rest the departed soul in eternal peace.
